meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marti Ermiter Joe Roberts Harry Cortez Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1189.

td.p: Marti Ermiter, a claims represenative originally from Wheeling, Illinois
Joe Roberts, a director of planning & building from Perth Amboy, New Jersey
Harry Cortez, a mail processor from Petaluma, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,500)

tr.td: SCIENCE
FAMOUS WOMEN
WORLD TRAVEL
GOLDEN OLDIES
AWARDS
MILK

Twyla Tharp

Marti
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
